member.name: T:NUnit.TextUI.TestRunner
member.summary: A command line based tool to run tests.
member.remarks:
C:\NUnitConsole.exe /t [/wait] TestCaseClass
TestRunner expects the name of a TestCase class as argument. If this class defines a static Suite property it will be invoked and the returned test is run. Otherwise all the methods starting with "Test" having no arguments are run.
When the wait command line argument is given TestRunner waits until the users types RETURN.
TestRunner prints a trace as the tests are executed followed by a summary at the end.

member.name: M:NUnit.TextUI.TestRunner.#ctor(System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Constructs a TestRunner using the given stream for all the output

member.name: M:NUnit.TextUI.TestRunner.CreateTestResult

member.summary: Prints failures to the standard output.

member.summary: Prints the header of the report.

member.summary: Runs a Suite extracted from a TestCase subclass.

member.name: M:NUnit.TextUI.TestRunner.RunAndWait(NUnit.Framework.ITest)

member.name: M:NUnit.TextUI.TestRunner.Start(System.String[])
member.summary: Starts a test run. Analyzes the command line arguments and runs the given test suite.
